data.text:
To view the flowers sent to Jimmy's family, as well as the Tribute Video, please click the following link.

Jimmy Bryant Obituary (2022) - Pryor, Oklahoma (gather.app)

Jimmy Ray Bryant, 76, of Pryor, passed from this life on March 6, 2022, in Pryor, Oklahoma. He was born on July 12, 1945, in Pryor; the son of Roger and Lillie Belle Bryant. Jimmy grew up and lived in the Pryor area most of his life. He went to work as an aircraft mechanic at Boeing and retired from there. Jimmy was an avid OU Sooners fan. In his free time, he enjoyed working on cars, but most of all he enjoyed spending time with his grandchildren and family. Jimmy loved the Lord and fellowshipping with his church family. He leaves behind many wonderful memories for his family to cherish.

Memorial services for Jimmy will be held at 11:00 a.m., Friday, March 11, 2022, at Shipman’s Funeral Home Chapel with Nathan Chamberlain officiating. To leave his family a message, please visit his Tribute Wall at www.shipmansfuneralhome.com. Cremation arrangements are under the direction of Shipman’s Funeral & Cremation Service.

Jimmy is survived by his longtime companion, Carmen Bryant; sons, Quinton Bryant and wife Jennifer of Adair and Jeff Bryant of Queen Creek, Arizona; brother, Danny Bryant and wife Jean of Denver, Colorado; sister, Diana Bethel of Pryor; 7 grandchildren, Cooper, Ryn, Callie, Chandler, Sabrina, Alex and Samuel Bryant and many other relatives and friends. He is preceded in death by his parents; Roger and Lillie Belle, sister; Debbie Bryant and nephew Todd Bethel.
